Html:
Hallo everyone...im new here and i hear about you from a person in another forum.

 

I have set this in A1 cell

 

$objPHPExcel->setActiveSheetIndex(0)
            ->setCellValue('A1', 'aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa');



When i open the file in OpenOffice Calc in A1 cell appeared only 'aaaaaaa' and the rest are hide..

How can i make it to be appeared all text in the cells?

Thanks in advance!

Hi,

 

you have to change the width of the column. Either set it to a fixed width, which is big enough to fit the string in, or ou can set it to autowidth.

 

Mike
